Question
========

In an experiment, students with behavioral problems are randomly assigned to one of two conditions. The researchers want to know which condition produces better results in terms of the number of conflicts reported, controlling for the age of the students.

Which method is best suited to answer their question? 
Answerlist
----------
* Covariance analysis (ANCOVA)
* One-way variance analysis (one-way ANOVA)
* Two-way variance analysis (two-way ANOV)
* Single linear regression analysis (bivariate OLS)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
